title: [机制] PrisonUtils —— 永久药水效果，自动熔炼，伤害保护 [API7]
author: wulangyu
txt_content:
本帖最后由 wulangyu 于 2019-7-15 18:08 编辑 
棱镜 PrisonUtils用于管理药水效果，伤害减免等功能


功能：
      1.自动熔炼，自动冶炼可熔炼的物品，如铁矿
      2.掉落的物品直接进入库存                  
      3.放置特定原因造成的伤害
      4.永久的药水效果
      5.牢不可破的稿子，防止耐久下降
      6.鹤嘴镐，显示主人和耐久等


用法：
     1.下载插件放到mods文件夹
     2.启动服务器生成配置文件
     3.修改配置文件开启功能


配置文件：
# 玩家登录时的永久效果(药剂效果|效果等级)
"Active Potion Effects" {
    "minecraft:absorption"=0
    "minecraft:blindness"=0
    "minecraft:fire_resistance"=0
    "minecraft:glowing"=0
    "minecraft:haste"=0
    "minecraft:health_boost"=0
    "minecraft:hunger"=0
    "minecraft:invisibility"=0
    "minecraft:jump_boost"=0
    "minecraft:luck"=0
    "minecraft:mining_fatigue"=0
    "minecraft:nausea"=0
    "minecraft:night_vision"=0
    "minecraft:poison"=0
    "minecraft:regeneration"=0
    "minecraft:resistance"=0
    "minecraft:saturation"=0
    "minecraft:slowness"=0
    "minecraft:speed"=0
    "minecraft:strength"=0
    "minecraft:unluck"=0
    "minecraft:water_breathing"=0
    "minecraft:weakness"=0
    "minecraft:wither"=0
}
# 防止玩家在下面原因中收到伤害
"Damage Prevention" {
    Drown=false
    Explosive=false
    Fall=false
    Fire=false
    Hunger=false
    Magic=false
    Magma=false
    Suffocate=false
    Void=false
}
# 改变拖动物品的操作方式
"Dropped Items" {
    Auto-Smelt=true
    # 自动熔炼的黑名单（下列物品不受自动熔炼影响）
    "Auto-Smelt BlackList"=[
        "minecraft:log",
        "minecraft:log2"
    ]
    "Dropped to Inventory"=true
}
# 上述三个功能控制开关
Modules {
    "Damage Prevention"=true
    "Dropped Items"=true
    "Permanent Effects"=true
}
# 鹤嘴镐和无限耐久搞启用开关
"Tool Options" {
    "Pickaxe Lore"=false
    "Unbreakable Pickaxes"=false
}复制代码
